raw_body: JOAN PERERA (nee ATTON) – Dearly beloved wife of late Darlan Perera,​ darling mother of Domani and Spencer Manuelpillai,​ Desline and Sanjeewa Attanayake and Damian,​ precious nana of Siobhan,​ Thavisha,​ Shontaal,​ Gavishka and Avisha,​ loving sister of Margie,​ Sheila,​ Barbara,​ Loxly and Conrad and of late George,​ Eva,​ Connie,​ Olean,​ Carmen,​ Doreen,​ Sydney and Brinsley. Remains lie at A.F. Raymond Funeral Parlour on Saturday 4th November from 9 a.m. to 3.30 p.m. Cremation at 4 p.m. at Borella Cemetery (Old Crematorium).071243
